revised_title: Embryology of Monotremata and Marsupialia: A Comparative Study of Egg-Membranes and Segmentation
tldr: This study compares the embryology of Monotremata and Marsupialia, focusing on egg-membranes and segmentation. It describes the development of egg-membranes in both groups and discusses the differences in segmentation processes. The author also compares their findings to those of placental mammals, providing insights into the development and evolution of vertebrates.
